title: WTB: Babe Ruth Exhibits and 1921/22 Ruth’s with Scarce Backs

posts.post_title: WTB: Babe Ruth Exhibits and 1921/22 Ruth’s with Scarce Backs
posts.post_content:
Please let me know what you have for sale. I am a collector not a dealer; I can pay more. Also interested in any early Ruth items. If you have something to offer please email me at oldjudge@gmail.com

Thanks!
